text:
mE &kRuShTapaqcyaM ca# mE grAqyAMSca# mE paqSava# AraqNyASca# yaqj~jEna# kalpantAM 
~MviqttaM ca# mEq vitti#Sca mE BUqtaM ca# mEq BUti#Sca mEq vasu# ca mE vasaqtiSca# mEq 
karma# ca mEq Sakti#Scaq mE&rtha#Sca maq Ema#Sca maq iti#Sca mEq gati#Sca mE ||	10
(kRuqShTaqpaqcyaM cAq - &ShTAca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A5)
